db:abstract.db:para: List of arguments to pass to Android applications.

db:article.db:para: List of arguments to pass to Android applications.
This variable was introduced in Qt 6.0.

db:note.db:para: This variable is in technology preview and may change in future releases.
This variable is used only if targeting the Android platform.

db:article.db:para: Contains a list of arguments to be passed to Android applications. This variable is written out as part of the deployment settings for a target.
